attributes.action: Allow people to pay for top up cancer treatment without it affecting NHS treatment costs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently if you want to pay for top up treatment for cancer the NHS then charge you for all of your cancer treatment costs.

This is grossly unfair.

If the NHS won't pay for certain types of cancer treatment or drugs then you should be allowed to pay for this and this should not affect the cost of your NHS cancer treatment which should continue to be funded by the NHS.
